author: Efosa Udinmwen
description: SpiNNaker 2 mimics brain architecture with 152 cores per chip and no disks, offering fast, memory-centric computing for defense.
title: A system inspired by the human brain has quietly been activated at a US nuclear lab, and it has no operating system or storage

author: Efosa Udinmwen
description: Quantum Brilliance aims to build compact QPUs with up to 100 qubits, targeting AI and sensing tasks using diamonds instead of cryogenic quantum systems.
title: This German startup wants to build portable quantum computers using diamonds - and says its QPU will sit next to a GPU or a CPU one day

author: Hamish Hector
description: The Android Find Hub compatible Moto Tag finally boasts UWB, in a move that brings it on par with the AirTag.
title: This Android AirTags rival finally got the one big feature it's been missing

author: Craig Hale
description: More than 4,000 fake domains have been spotted on malicious Meta ads – most of them offer premium products at very low prices.
title: No, those amazing deals on Facebook aren't real - it's a scam, and here's how to spot it

author: Jacob Krol
description: If you can't stream your favorite song or are having issues accessing one of Google's services, you're not alone
title: Can't access Spotify or a part of Google? Everything we know about this outage impacting major services

author: Darren Allan
description: Even though PCIe 6.0 still hasn’t arrived, PCIe 7.0 has just been announced – and work has begun on PCIe 8.0. Confused? We’ll explain it all.
title: PCIe 7.0 has been announced, offering superfast speeds for the components inside your PC – but don’t get excited just yet

author: Carrie Marshall
description: Edifier reveals a high-spec tabletop, two portables and ANC headphones too
title: Edifier’s new retro-style wireless speaker range looks very cool, and has the features to take on JBL and Sonos

author: Jacob Krol
description: Join us for a special WWDC 2025 edition of the TechRadar Podcast, live from Apple Park, as we unpack Liquid Glass, the big iPadOS 16 update, and everything else Apple unveiled, featuring two special guests: Kate Kozuch and Rich DeMuro.
title: Live from WWDC 2025 – TechRadar podcast unpacks that massive iPadOS update and looks through Liquid Glass

author: Sead Fadilpašić
description: Fake Booking.com site found dropping a dangerous RAT to people's computers, experts warn.
title: Holidaymakers under threat from devious new cyber threat - here's how to stay safe

author: Darren Allan
description: Watch out, Apple: Microsoft wakes up and joins the Liquid Glass fun-poking party, being six millionth in line to point out that Windows Vista got there first.
title: Microsoft makes fun of macOS Tahoe’s Liquid Glass redesign for ripping off Windows Vista – but Apple could have the last laugh

author: Wayne Williams
description: Utran launches GPU-sized PCIe 5.0 card with 224TB storage and blistering 109GB/s read speed for AI and HPC.
title: This GPU-like internal card combines 28 M.2 SSDs to offer up to 109GB/s read speed and 224TB storage - but I struggle to see any real use for it

author: Demi Williams
description: Konami has announced thatMetal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater will have an online multiplayer mode called Fox Hunt.
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater will have several game modes, but I'm most excited about the newly announced Fox Hunt online multiplayer

author: Mark Wilson
description: A small but helpful new iOS 26 feature promises to solve the frustrating issue of wireless headphones auto-switching from iPhones to unwanted nearby devices.

author: Sead Fadilpašić
description: Security researchers discovered a way to extract sensitive information from Microsoft 365 Copilot.

description: Design platform unveils new updates and finally rolls out Figma Make for Full Seat users.

description: This easy trick can save you 50% off 3 months of ChatGPT Plus.

author: Demi Williams
description: Konami has announced that a Silent Hill remake is in development at Bloober Team.

description: A serial leaker claims that DJI’s next trio of creative products – two new cameras and a wireless microphone – will all be released in July 2025.

author: Carrie Marshall
description: Prime Video doubling the number of ads is the final confirmation I needed that streaming is becoming its own worst enemy.

description: Fake DeepSeek website found serving dangerous malware instead of the popular app.

description: Tech sector is uniquely placed to pioneer low emission, intelligent and scalable green practices.

description: Dying Light: The Beast is set to see the return of former series protagonist Kyle Crane, but Techland has said that fans will need to play the game to find out.

title: Konami Press Start live build-up: our coverage of the Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater and Silent Hill f live stream, as well as how to watch info

description: The Nintendo Switch 2 has quickly become the new staple in my ‘fun uncle’ line-up of gadgets and gizmos.

description: Google’s Veo 3 Fast upgrade makes AI video generation quicker and more accessible without a higher price.
